name: Ka-ching! tha money - A two-player Game
name_original: Ka-ching! tha money - A two-player Game
description:
This game was made for Trijam #125. Theme: One Enemy Only

I made a WebGL version, but it won't load. I am sorry. Nevertheless,  hope you will try playing the game.

 
Play this game with a friend, the one and only enemy.

Why are there moneybags chasing each other because of money?

Because money often ruins friendships.

Controls:
Green "The Good": w,a,s,d
Collect 25 banknotes to win or flee

Red "The Enemy": arrow keys
Catch "The Good" to win

Watch out! There are randomly spawning banknotes and obstacles!
The ice fields will only freeze the Enemy.

After a specific time, two exits will appear, and the map gets cleared so that the good money bag can flee within five seconds to win in another way.

I made the graphics and the gameplay by myself, besides the music and the font. The font is from here: https://www.1001freefonts.com/8-bit-operator.font
